projects.title: Dolphin News
projects.description: Dolphin News is a full-stack application featuring a RESTful API backend and a React frontend. The backend, built using JavaScript and Axios, offers CRUD functionality and is hosted on Supabase and Render. The frontend is a responsive React application, hosted on Netlify, allowing users to browse and interact with news articles.
projects.languages: JavaScript, React, Axios, Supabase, Render, Netlify

projects.title: Swimming Dolphin Clock
projects.description: This is a Python project where I built a digital clock with a swimming dolphin animation. It was a fun way to blend creativity with programming, involving animations and time functions in Python.

projects.title: PDF Comparer with OCR
projects.description: The PDF Comparer is a tool that uses Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to compare PDF documents and highlight differences. It’s particularly useful for ensuring document accuracy by detecting even subtle changes.

projects.title: PiTemps
projects.description: PiTemps is an ongoing project where I’m using Raspberry Pis to measure temperatures at 16 different points and display the information live over a local wireless network. This project integrates hardware and software to monitor and visualize real-time temperature data.
